name: df-mpq
body: |- wceq(cmpq, cmpo(s0, s1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cxp(cnpi, cnpi), cop(co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cmi, cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cmi, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))))))
comment: Define pre-multiplication on positive fractions. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-2.4 of [Gleason] p. 119. (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
